archimate:Principle.name: Compliance
archimate:Principle.documentation: Solutions and services must be compliant to applicable laws and regulations. All activities must adhere to internally set policies and standards set by the authorized TietoEVRY corporate governing bodies. Solutions, services, and designs must comply to TietoEVRY and C&I defined standards and frameworks. If applicable TietoEVRY or C&I framework is not explicitly defined, industry standard and open frameworks and best practices are preferred over proprietary standards and frameworks.
